content: I recently started my PhD in Computer Science with Professor Ryan Cotterell at ETH Zürich. I am passionate about general applications of statistics and information theory to natural language processing. In my free time, I like to rock climb, trail run, and search for the elusive cheap bar in Switzerland.

title: Clara Meister
